name: Travelling SalesDuck Game
description:
Have you ever heard of the Travelling Salesman Problem (TSP)? Have you ever wanted to make a fortune?

Travellig SalesDuck Game accomplishes both things providing a short and fun exerience where you have 15 minutes to make as much money as you can using clever path and time management between different business: Invert your money in stock markets, go find treasures along your way or go from house to house selling duck jewelery.

This game takes inspiration from mechanics of games such as Roll or even Loop Hero, additionaly includes a global leaderboad to compete against the world to see who makes more money as a duck!
